name: create-nodejs-express-app
description: Create a Node.js app for building production-ready RESTful APIs using Express, by running one command
author: MacsG

scripts.clear: npm cache clean --force && npm cache verify && clear
scripts.migrate: cd src && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --migrations-path ./migrations/core/ --config ./config/core/config.js && cd .. && npm cache clean --force && npm cache verify
scripts.tenant_migrate: cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate  --migrations-path ./migrations/tenant/ --config ./config/core/config.js && cd .. && npm cache clean --force && npm cache verify
scripts.seed: cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --seeders-path ./seeders/core/ --config ./config/core/config.js && cd .. && npm cache clean --force && npm cache verify
scripts.seed-tenant: cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --seeders-path ./seeders/tenant/ --config ./config/core/config.js && cd .. && npm cache clean --force && npm cache verify
scripts.tmigrate: cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate  --migrations-path ./migrations/tenant/ --config ./config/org_15_tenant.config.js && cd .. && npm cache clean --force && npm cache verify
scripts.tseed: cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --seeders-path ./seeders/tenant/ --config ./config/org_197_tenant.config.js && cd .. && npm cache clean --force && npm cache verify
scripts.basic_seed: cd src && node basic-seeds.js && cd .. && npm cache clean --force && npm cache verify
scripts.test_migrate: cd src && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --migrations-path ./migrations/core/ --config ./config/core/config.js && cd .. && npm cache clean --force && npm cache verify
scripts.test_seed: cd src && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --seeders-path ./seeders/core/ --config ./config/core/config.js && cd .. && npm cache clean --force && npm cache verify
